protocol_name: Labeling of porcine mesenchymal stromal cells (MSCs) with Indium-111-oxine
protocol_name_html: Labeling of porcine mesenchymal stromal cells (MSCs) with Indium-111-oxine
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Buffer Indium-111-oxine with Tris buffer to increase the pH of Indium-111-oxine to 7-8
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Buffer Indium-111-oxine with Tris buffer to increase the pH of Indium-111-oxine to 7-8

components.data: - Indium-111-oxine was supplied by Mallinckrodt Medical B.V., Petten, The Netherlands
components.name: Description

source_data.description: - Indium-111-oxine was supplied by Mallinckrodt Medical B.V., Petten, The Netherlands

source_data.body: Always be careful when working with radioactive substances. Only allow trained personnel to perform this kind of work.

components.data: Remove and discard supernatant. Be careful not to touch the cell pellet
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Remove and discard supernatant. Be careful not to touch the cell pellet

components.data: Place the MSCs-Hanks buffer suspension in a lead container and add ~40 megabecquerel (MBq) of buffered Indium-111-oxine
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Place the MSCs-Hanks buffer suspension in a lead container and add ~40 megabecquerel (MBq) of buffered Indium-111-oxine

components.data: - Indium-111-oxine was supplied by Mallinckrodt Medical B.V., Petten, The Netherlands
components.name: Description

source_data.description: - Indium-111-oxine was supplied by Mallinckrodt Medical B.V., Petten, The Netherlands

components.data: Centrifuge the pellet + 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Centrifuge the pellet + 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)

components.data: After 20 minutes of incubation, centrifuge the MSC-Indium mixture for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: After 20 minutes of incubation, centrifuge the MSC-Indium mixture for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)

components.data:
- Divide the radioactive signal coming from the cell pellet by the signal coming from the complete vial to calculate the labeling efficiency.

- For instance: if the complete vial contains 10 MBq of radioactivity and the cell pellet contains 9 MBq of radioactivity, the labeling efficiency is (9 MBq / 10 MBq)*100 = 90%
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
- Divide the radioactive signal coming from the cell pellet by the signal coming from the complete vial to calculate the labeling efficiency.

- For instance: if the complete vial contains 10 MBq of radioactivity and the cell pellet contains 9 MBq of radioactivity, the labeling efficiency is (9 MBq / 10 MBq)*100 = 90%

components.data: Measure the radiation coming from the vial containing the cell pellet and supernatant. Then remove the supernatant with a syringe and measure the signal coming from the cell pellet, syringe and supernatant seperately with a dose calibrator to calculate the labeling efficiency
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Measure the radiation coming from the vial containing the cell pellet and supernatant. Then remove the supernatant with a syringe and measure the signal coming from the cell pellet, syringe and supernatant seperately with a dose calibrator to calculate the labeling efficiency

components.data: Dissolve the pellet in 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Dissolve the pellet in 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution

components.data: - Hanks buffer used: Hank’s Balanced Salt Solution 1x CaCl2+ MgCl2+ (Life Technologies Corp, Grand Island, NY, USA)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: - Hanks buffer used: Hank’s Balanced Salt Solution 1x CaCl2+ MgCl2+ (Life Technologies Corp, Grand Island, NY, USA)

components.data: Measure the radioactive signal coming from the vial containing the cell pellet and 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution. Then remove the supernatant with a syringe and measure the signal coming from the cell pellet, syringe and supernatant seperately with a dose calibrator to calculate the labeling efficiency
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Measure the radioactive signal coming from the vial containing the cell pellet and 10 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution. Then remove the supernatant with a syringe and measure the signal coming from the cell pellet, syringe and supernatant seperately with a dose calibrator to calculate the labeling efficiency

components.data: Repeat step 10, 11, and 12 a total of 3 to 4 times until a labeling efficiency of 90 - 95% is achieved
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Repeat step 10, 11, and 12 a total of 3 to 4 times until a labeling efficiency of 90 - 95% is achieved

components.data: Add 10 milliliters of phosphate buffered saline to the cell pellet and dissolve the pellet. The cell suspension is now ready for administration
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Add 10 milliliters of phosphate buffered saline to the cell pellet and dissolve the pellet. The cell suspension is now ready for administration

components.data: - Hanks buffer used: Hank’s Balanced Salt Solution 1x CaCl2+ MgCl2+ (Life Technologies Corp, Grand Island, NY, USA)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: - Hanks buffer used: Hank’s Balanced Salt Solution 1x CaCl2+ MgCl2+ (Life Technologies Corp, Grand Island, NY, USA)

components.data: Resuspend the MSCs in 1 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Resuspend the MSCs in 1 milliliters of Hanks buffered saline solution

components.data: Centrifuge the MSCs suspended in culture medium for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Centrifuge the MSCs suspended in culture medium for 5 minutes at 300 G (1224 rpm)

components.data: Incubate for 20 minutes at room temperature (20 degrees Celcius)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Incubate for 20 minutes at room temperature (20 degrees Celcius)
